docs.snippet: San Antonio erased an early 16-point deficit to capture its fifth championship in 16 seasons and avenge a finals loss against Miami last year....
docs.lead_paragraph: San Antonio erased an early 16-point deficit to capture its fifth championship in 16 seasons and avenge a finals loss against Miami last year.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs defeat Miami Heat, 104-87, in Game 5 of NBA finals to capture their fifth championship in 16 seasons and avenge 2013 loss; Spurs take series, 4-1, snuffing out Heat's well-publicized quest for a third-straight title.

headline.main: Spurs Win Fifth Title, Cementing Dynasty Across Decades
headline.print_headline: With 5th Title, Spurs Have Dynasty Across Decades

docs.snippet: On the verge of elimination, Miami entered Game 5 on Sunday night with a decision to make on defense: Play with greater activity or back off....
docs.lead_paragraph: On the verge of elimination, Miami entered Game 5 on Sunday night with a decision to make on defense: Play with greater activity or back off.

headline.main: With Offensive Bonanza, Spurs Force the Heat to Consider Taking Fewer Gambles
headline.print_headline: With Offensive Bonanza, Spurs Force the Heat to Consider Taking Fewer Gambles

docs.snippet: LeBron James had a game-high 31 points to go with 10 rebounds, 5 assists and 2 blocks, and he helped limit Tony Parker. But without help, he could not stop the Spurs....
docs.lead_paragraph: LeBron James had a game-high 31 points to go with 10 rebounds, 5 assists and 2 blocks, and he helped limit Tony Parker. But without help, he could not stop the Spurs.

headline.main: James, Even at His Best, Can’t Carry the Heat to the Finish
headline.print_headline: James, Even at His Best, Can’t Carry the Heat to the Finish

docs.snippet: Kelsey Griffin had 12 points and a game-high 9 rebounds, and the Connecticut Sun earned their fourth straight win with a 76-72 victory over the Liberty in Uncasville, Conn....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kelsey Griffin had 12 points and a game-high 9 rebounds, and the Connecticut Sun earned their fourth straight win with a 76-72 victory over the Liberty in Uncasville, Conn.
docs.abstract: Connecticut Sun defeats New York Liberty, 76-72, in WNBA action.

docs.snippet: Silence on the salaries reigns supreme at Madison Square Garden, but in recent months, former N.F.L. cheerleaders have accused teams of violating labor laws....
docs.lead_paragraph: Silence on the salaries reigns supreme at Madison Square Garden, but in recent months, former N.F.L. cheerleaders have accused teams of violating labor laws.
docs.abstract: Rachel L Swarns The Working Life column observes that salary of Knicks City Dancers, cheerleaders for New York Knicks, is a secret; notes that some women auditioning for the cheerleading team are struck by fact that salary is never discussed, but most are just concerned with making the cut.

headline.main: Dancing for the Knicks Is a Coveted Opportunity, but the Salary Is a Secret
headline.print_headline: Dancing for the Knicks Is a Coveted Opportunity, but the Salary Is a Secret

docs.snippet: With eight players on the current roster born outside the United States, the Spurs have made a complicated game look easy by speaking a common language: top-flight basketball....
docs.lead_paragraph: With eight players on the current roster born outside the United States, the Spurs have made a complicated game look easy by speaking a common language: top-flight basketball.
docs.abstract: NBA champion San Antonio Spurs have developed an international flair under coach Gregg Popovich; eight players on the current roster were born outside the United States, meaning the Spurs use at least four languages to communicate among themselves.

headline.seo: San Antonio Spurs Use Language Barriers to Their Advantage
headline.main: The United Nations of the Hardwood
headline.print_headline: The United Nations of the Hardwood

docs.snippet: Authorities say a 10-year-old North Carolina boy is in the hospital after he accidentally hanged himself on a basketball goal in his yard....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say a 10-year-old North Carolina boy is in the hospital after he accidentally hanged himself on a basketball goal in his yard.

headline.main: Boy Accidentally Hangs Self From Basketball Net

docs.snippet: Thousands poured into the streets of San Antonio in boisterous and mostly crime-free celebrations on Sunday night after the Spurs won their fifth National Basketball Association championship in 15 years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands poured into the streets of San Antonio in boisterous and mostly crime-free celebrations on Sunday night after the Spurs won their fifth National Basketball Association championship in 15 years.

headline.main: Spurs Fans Fill San Antonio Streets With Peaceful Celebrations
headline.print_headline: Spurs Fans Fill San Antonio Streets With Peaceful Celebrations

docs.snippet: The San Antonio Spurs delivered a decisive end to LeBron James' two-year reign atop the basketball world by routing the Miami Heat 104-87 on Sunday to win the NBA Finals four games to one....
docs.lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs delivered a decisive end to LeBron James' two-year reign atop the basketball world by routing the Miami Heat 104-87 on Sunday to win the NBA Finals four games to one.

headline.main: San Antonio Spurs Beat Miami Heat to Clinch NBA Title
headline.print_headline: San Antonio Spurs Beat Miami Heat to Clinch NBA Title

docs.snippet: A former Oklahoma State basketball player accused of sexually assaulting two women at an off-campus party in 2010 will not be retried after an appeals court tossed out his conviction, prosecutors said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former Oklahoma State basketball player accused of sexually assaulting two women at an off-campus party in 2010 will not be retried after an appeals court tossed out his conviction, prosecutors said Monday.

headline.main: Ex-OK St Player Won't Be Retried in Assault Case
